about_the_game:
It's time to face! As Milton, your past invites you to solve the mysteries. What you learn about yourself will surprise you. Most importantly remember that this is not a nightmare, this is a reality.

Through Milton's eyes, you will see his dark past and solve this mystery with various puzzles and answer Milton 'who you are?'.

Milton wants to get rid of the nightmares he's had for years, so he goes to face his past. But there are things he doesn't know. And learning these can be challenging for Milton.

Why is he having these nightmares? Where is this place in your nightmares? Who does this familiar voice, coming from the depths of the darkness in their nightmares, belong to? She says come. She's asking for help. Not just one sound, but many sounds. Let's find out who the voices are and see the truth.

Be careful. Because in your nightmares you wake up when you're scared, but you can't wake up here. Because everything is real.

Main Features

  • Travel on the path of your dreams and solve mysteries.

  • Don't stay in the dark, turn on your light.

  • Don't resist those who call you, just run.

  • You will eventually learn the answers to all the questions you have about yourself.

  • Get rid of your nightmares and find peace.
